00033 #include "EdgeLengthMetric.hpp"
00034 #include "PatchData.hpp"
00035 #include "MsqError.hpp"
00036 #include "Matrix3D.hpp"
00037 
00038 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00039 
00040 
00041 EdgeLengthMetric::EdgeLengthMetric( double gamma )
00042   : mGamma( gamma ) {}
00043 
00044 std::string EdgeLengthMetric::get_name() const
00045   { return "EdgeLength"; }
00046 
00048 int EdgeLengthMetric::get_negate_flag() const
00049   { return 1; }
00050 
00051 bool EdgeLengthMetric::evaluate( PatchData& pd, 
00052                  size_t handle, 
00053                  double& value, 
00054                  MsqError& err )
00055 {
00056   MsqMeshEntity& e = pd.element_by_index( elem(handle) );
00057   const unsigned* vert_nums;
00058   vert_nums = TopologyInfo::edge_vertices( e.get_element_type(), edge(handle), err );
00059   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00060   size_t svi = e.get_vertex_index( vert_nums[0] );
00061   size_t evi = e.get_vertex_index( vert_nums[1] );
00062   Vector3D diff = pd.vertex_by_index( svi ) - pd.vertex_by_index( evi );
00063   double len_sqr = diff % diff - mGamma;
00064   if (len_sqr <= 0.0) {
00065     value = 0.0;
00066     return false; 
00067   }
00068   value = sqrt(len_sqr);
00069   return true;
00070 }
00071 
00072 bool EdgeLengthMetric::evaluate_with_gradient( PatchData& pd,
00073                  size_t handle,
00074                  double& value,
00075                  std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00076                  std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00077                  MsqError& err )
00078 {
00079   MsqMeshEntity& e = pd.element_by_index( elem(handle) );
00080   const unsigned* vert_nums;
00081   vert_nums = TopologyInfo::edge_vertices( e.get_element_type(), edge(handle), err );
00082   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00083   size_t svi = e.get_vertex_index( vert_nums[0] );
00084   size_t evi = e.get_vertex_index( vert_nums[1] );
00085   Vector3D diff = pd.vertex_by_index( svi ) - pd.vertex_by_index( evi );
00086   double val_sqr = diff % diff - mGamma;
00087   if (val_sqr <= 0.0) {
00088     value = 0.0;
00089     return false; 
00090   }
00091   value = sqrt(val_sqr);
00092   
00093   diff *= 1.0/value;
00094   indices.clear();
00095   gradient.clear();
00096   if (svi < pd.num_free_vertices())  {
00097     indices.push_back( svi );
00098     gradient.push_back( diff );
00099   }
00100   if (evi < pd.num_free_vertices()) {
00101     indices.push_back( evi ); 
00102     gradient.push_back( -diff );
00103   }
00104   
00105   return true;
00106 }
